userStories.title: Add working method UI to project settings
userStories.description:
## Task
Add UI dropdown in project edit modal for working method.

## UI Changes
- Add dropdown in ProjectModal
- Options: Auto-detect, Claude Code, VS Code
- Save to database on change

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Dropdown appears in project edit
- [ ] Changes persist to database
- [ ] Shows current setting

## File to Modify
`src/components/ProjectModal.tsx`
